about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Polygun, an endlessly customizable hero shooter where you battle against an ever increasing hoard of bloodthirsty shapes! With an array of upgrades to choose from, you'll quickly build from humble beginings into a hexa-bustin killing machine. The possibilities are endless! How long can you survive?

Choose your hero!  

Choose from among a variety of eye-catching heroes with unique weapons and ability focuses!  

Gain experience and unlock new upgrades!  

Unlock new levels of power by vanquishing foes and spend your hard-won experience points to transform your character into an unstoppable force!  

Customize your game!  

Polygun has full customizability, from editing color palettes, and creating new heroes, to custom upgrades and difficulties, you can tailor the perfect Polygun for you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Super (Or Similar 4 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Limited Testing on Intel UHD Graphics 770
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K Processor (Or Similar)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super (Or Similar 6 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
